title: Damaged
description: In the aftermath of an escape that almost claimed their lives, Jai and Emily are on the run. While Emily uses the time to recover and heal, Jai prepares for war.His resolve is unwavering. His thirst for vengeance unquenchable.Can Jai and Emily find Joel in time? Or will Skull catch them and make them pay for their betrayal before Joel's whereabouts is discovered?
author: Skyla Madi
